class.name: franka_control_custom/CartesianVelocityController
class.description: A controller that executes a short motion based on cartesian velocities to demonstrate correct usage

class.name: franka_control_custom/CartesianImpedanceController
class.description: A controller that renders a spring damper system in cartesian space.

class.name: franka_control_custom/FrankaStateController
class.description: A controller that publishes the complete robot state.
